name: Doctor
greetingText: Finally the day is here, yayy!!
wishText: I hope you always stay , and healthy too ;)
text2: Toh that's what I was going to do.
text4: And I realised, I wanted to do something...
outroText: Wishing you get everything you deserve, and desire! Stay blessed. With Love - Neo <3
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
